design_system.core_philosophy: Synthetic Intelligence requires a Synthetic Aesthetic. No soft gradients, no friendly rounded corners. Raw data, visible grids, and high-contrast terminal aesthetics.

usage_rules.headings: Use Chivo for all section titles. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Uppercase for subheaders.
usage_rules.body: Manrope for all UI text. High legibility.
usage_rules.mono: JetBrains Mono for ALL data values, confidence scores, pattern IDs, and chat logs.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Chivo:wght@300;400;700;900&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600&display=swap');

visual_enhancers.grid_background: Use a CSS radial-gradient dot pattern or linear-gradient grid pattern on the main background. Opacity 0.05.
visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Active panels (like the Reasoning Engine) must have a moving gradient border or 'tracing beam' effect to show activity.
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Optional: Overlay a pointer-events-none div with repeating-linear-gradient to simulate CRT scanlines on the Chat Interface.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl with bg-black/60 for floating panels. Add a 1px border-white/10.

components.buttons: Rectangular, sharp edges. Primary buttons should be 'si-laser' text on black bg with a 1px 'si-laser' border. Hover: bg-si-laser text-black.
components.cards: Flat 'si-panel' background. 1px border 'border-border'. No shadow. Hover: border-si-laser/50 transition-colors.
components.inputs: Terminal style. No background, bottom border only, or full black background with monospace text.
components.chat_bubbles: User: Border-only (border-white/20). AI: Full background (si-panel) with left-border accent (si-laser).

rules: Use CSS Grid for the main layout.
Sidebar (Pattern Stats): Fixed width 300px or col-span-3.
Right Panel (Reasoning/Metadata): Fixed width 350px or col-span-4.

motion.micro_interactions: Hovering a pattern ID should highlight it in the visualization.
motion.text_effect: Use a 'decoding' text effect for the AI response (random characters resolving to final text).

images.description: Abstract digital data flow for subtle background overlays (use with low opacity)
High contrast grid texture for specific data panels

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors + noise/texture.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Dark mode is the ONLY mode. Hardcode dark classes if necessary.
Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic robot emojis. Use abstract geometric shapes for icons.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'si-*' colors and 'Chivo/Manrope/JetBrains' fonts.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Install 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' if not present (standard for shadcn).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the Control Room Grid.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'ChatInterface' with the specific 'decoding' text effect.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Implement the 'PatternVisualizer' using simple CSS grids or Canvas (no heavy 3D libs unless necessary).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Ensure the 'Confidence Score' is a prominent, large monospace number.
